Source Question: Which one of these figures most closely resembles your hair pattern at age 40?
Format/Value: Full head of hair with no hair loss.
Very mild hair loss or thinning of hair on the top of the head along the middle of the head
Mild hair loss on the top of the head along the middle of the head.
Mild-to-moderate hair loss on the top of the head along the middle of the head.
Moderate hair loss on the top of the head along the middle of the head.
Severe hair loss on the top of the head, but no hair loss at the forehead
Severe hair loss on the top of the head, and the hair along the forehead is thinning.
Severehair loss on the top of the head from the forehead to the back of the ears.
Moderate hair loss on the sides of the head at the forehead and moderate-to-severe hair loss on the top of the head.
